channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Webinar-March 6: Webex Training Session
item.description: Join us on Friday, March 6, from 11am-12pm for a hands-on Webex Training Session, part of the MMS Collaboration Software Training series. This session focuses on the Webex application and its integration with Outlook and Blackboard, so you can efficiently schedule, launch, and manage meetings directly from the tools you use every day. Register now: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700
item.author: Community

item.title: Spring Break 2026 Hours – Residential and Retail Dining
item.description: Spring Break is almost here! Residential Dining Halls (BARH, Blitman, Commons, and Russell Sage) will be closed February 28th, 2026 - March 7th, 2026. Retail Hours can be found in the link above. Normal residential and retail dining hours of operations will resume on March 9th, 2026. Have a safe and relaxing Spring Break!
item.author: Community

item.title: Upcoming closures in Shuttle services
item.description: Friendly reminder that shuttles do not operate on holidays or during University closures. In observance of Spring Break (February 28–March 7), shuttles will not be running. Please plan accordingly.
item.author: Community

item.title: Information Security - Vote on Top 3 AI Phish Coach Names:
item.description: Thank you everyone for sending proposed names for our new AI Phishing Coach! After team vote, we have narrowed our selection down to the top three choices: bAIt and tackle, Phishing Net, and PhishStick. Please click above link to vote for your favorite name! Voting will close on Monday, March 2nd.
item.author: Community

item.title: 2025 1095-C Tax Document Available
item.description:
Form 1095-C, Employer-Provided Health Insurance Offer and Coverage provides important tax information about your offer of health coverage by Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. If you were not a full-time employee or covered individual at any point during the calendar year, you do not receive a Form 1095-C.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
